spell.potatospellbookstweaks.mana_shield: Reduces damage received based on mana shield strength and current mana. Replaces other resistance effects and goes up to 90% damage reduction.
effect.potatospellbookstweaks.mana_shiel: Reduces damage received based on mana shield strength and current mana. Replaces other resistance effects and goes up to 90% damage reduction.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.mana_steal_: Steals a % of your damage dealt as mana.
effect.potatospellbookstweaks.mana_steal: Steals a % of your damage dealt as mana.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.mana_rend_s: Deals bonus damage based on the target's mana.
Deals bonus damage based on the target's mana.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.elysium.gui: Deal bonus damage for every point of missing mana.
effect.potatospellbookstweaks.dauntless_: Increases Critical Chance and Cooldown Reduction, but makes the user unable to heal normally.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.dauntless.g: Deal bonus damage for every point of missing health. Heals for 10% of the damage dealt.
effect.potatospellbookstweaks.ravenous.d: Increased damage, cooldown reduction, and crit chance. Deal increased damage based on the target's lost health (max at 10%)
effect.potatospellbookstweaks.hunger.des: Decreased damage, cooldown reduction, and crit chance.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.ravenous.gu: Deal damage to targets, applying Hunger to them, and Ravenous to yourself.
effect.potatospellbookstweaks.praxis.des: Prevents Spinning Dragon from applying. Increases the damage of Praxis by 10% for every level of the effect.
effect.potatospellbookstweaks.spinning_d: The next damage instance caused will be set to 0 and remove Spinning Dragon.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.praxis.guid: Apply Spinning Dragon to the target, causing their next damage to be 0. Also applies Praxis to the target, preventing Spinning Dragon from being applied and increasing the damage from Praxis by 10% (stacks up to 256 times).
effect.potatospellbookstweaks.lacerate.d: Decreases the speed and damage significantly.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.lacerate.gu: Deals moderate damage and applies the Lacerate effect to the target.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.arcana_conc: Deals low damage. 50% chance to reduce Armor and Spell Resistance by 1% for every hit (max 22%).
effect.potatospellbookstweaks.valiance.d: Increased health, mana, damage, crit, and cooldown reduction.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.valiance.gu: Deals moderate damage. Applies Valiance to the caster.
effect.potatospellbookstweaks.acheron.de: Massively increases damage dealt, but deals damage to the user every second.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.acheron.gui: Causes a massive mana explosion. Applies Acheron to the caster.
spell.potatospellbookstweaks.mass_recall: Teleports the caster and all the allied entities nearby to the caster's respawn point.
